channel.title: Easy way of making Money
channel.description: So I recently noticed that you can make a lot of money spending your money on the random reward option. For 15 points i made nearly 3M. Its just quick cash for those who need it. Just a heads up.

item.title: Easy way of making Money
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:20, topic:439870”]Add a months worth of battlestaves as a purchase on the GE, do nothing for a month, enjoy 40-70m (depending on price you sell at) profit! Very easy and no effort involved. This can be done with many other items that have buy limits, so the potential for 500m+ a month isnt hard to reach.[/quote]Yea, but you need the money to start with… Where I only have 20m and you have like 2b

Read full topic

item.title: Easy way of making Money
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Add a months worth of battlestaves as a purchase on the GE, do nothing for a month, enjoy 40-70m (depending on price you sell at) profit! Very easy and no effort involved. This can be done with many other items that have buy limits, so the potential for 500m+ a month isnt hard to reach.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy way of making Money
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

you don’t spend money on the random reward option, do you?

No, you spend soul wars points

Read full topic

item.title: Easy way of making Money
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Stupit, post:17, topic:439870”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=542561.msg3976486#msg3976486 date=1334709086]

He obviously means that squeal of fortune thing.
@OP be careful because that squeal thing also is difficult to get shit from. If you get an armadyl godsword, you actually get a ‘lucky’ armadyl godsword that can’t be traded or sold.

Oh sorry, what’d you say about obviously?

Oh no. I forgot to mention at Soulwars. The Gambling option makes teh money.

[i]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/5620/fuckyoud.png[/img]

facepalm you used that meme wrong. You’re pretty much saying “I would kill you. If you weren’t the love of my life” That’s what the meme is used for. I can’t explain it all that well.
[/quote]
It’s used for like. ‘I’m going to kill you… In a fun, friendly game of Mario Kart!’[/quote]
thank you. <3

Read full topic
